message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its exceptional quality and value, I believe it's worth more than what others might pay. Considering its true worth and your potential satisfaction, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
